author: barnabasbusa
content: peerdas-devnet-4 was supposed to be coming with the rebased spec on top of pectra-devnet-5. However, if there is some momentum in wanting to launch devnet 4 with previous spec version (same as devnet 3 was), please let me know. That way we could launch something this week, with the potential client fixes.

author: barnabasbusa
content: If some clients already rebased on top of pectra, then devnet-4 would probably launch in the middle of december.

content:
```yaml
network_params:
  electra_fork_epoch: 1
  eip7594_fork_epoch: 1
  eip7594_fork_version: "0x60000038"
```
